attributes.action: recognise the importance and taste of chicksticks, as fishfingers have ruled for too long.!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chicksticks have long lived in the shadow of there nemesis the fishfinger. It is time the humble chickstick was recognised at a national and government level and I hereby call on the Prime Minister to knight the chicken snack. Arise Sir Chickstick.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
